on_join_dm:
Hello {user} <a:YaeJump:888060435042017320><a:YaeJump:888060435042017320><a:YaeJump:888060435042017320>, welcome to **{guild}**!

__**Due to repetitive questions being asked related to Yae's gameplay information and leaks,  please read <#918133080429047870> first before asking any questions.**__

Make sure to read the <#888054653877633074> to receive your Shrine Member role to access the server and get started!

If you cannot get the Shrine Member role from <#888054674798837770>, please type the command __**`!!enter`**__ in #✧・welcome channel.

If it still does not give you the role, kindly contact **SHRINE BOSS (Admin)** or **GONGUJI (Mods)** for manual roles.

Or you can send a message to me for a modmail! <a:YaeFukiretta:888056941237112863><a:YaeFukiretta:888056941237112863><a:YaeFukiretta:888056941237112863>
